text: ““Ndipo E inu anthu anga! Ine sindikukupemphani chuma pa uthengawu. Palibe malipiro anga, koma ali kwa Allah basi. Ndipo ine sindingathamangitse amene akhulupirira (monga momwe mudandipemphera kuti ndiwathamangitse anthu ofooka kuti inu mulowe m’malo mwawo), ndithu iwo adzakumana ndi Mbuye wawo, ndipo ine ndikukuonani monga anthu osazindikira (mbuli).”
